author: By Joshua Schneyer
title: Special Report: Married for 50 years, a couple are separated by the coronavirus
description: This is a love story. It began 50 years ago over an apple strudel in Paris, but Howard Smith says he has no time for romantic notions about the past. Right now he's worried about how the story will end.
content:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - This is a love story. It began 50 years ago over an apple strudel in Paris, but Howard Smith says he has no time for romantic notions about the past. Right now he’s worried about how the story will end.
